snippet.title: Time on Frog Island | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Time on Frog Island is coming on July 12th!
Wishlist on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1717510/Time_on_Frog_Island/
Wishlist on Nintendo Switch (US) https://bit.ly/3O49FCS
Wishlist on Nintendo Switch (UK) https://bit.ly/37dZmM0
Wishlist on PlayStation https://bit.ly/3OjzJdw
Find ToFI on Xbox https://bit.ly/3uEVCME

About Time on Frog Island
Shipwrecked on a strange island. A terrible storm ravages the seas around you, casting your mighty vessel into the perilous rocks of a nearby island. You awake to find your ship in pieces, shipwrecked on a strange island filled with… frogs

Explore at your own pace!
Make your own path in this island sandbox, you never know what will be around the next corner!

Trade to fix your boat
Ask around for the items you need, but bear in mind that you might need to do a frog a favour to get what you want...

Experiment with everything!
Discover different ways to complete those crucial trades. Run faster, jump higher, fall slower, anything is possible if you’re holding the right item.

Steam here https://bit.ly/3mi4PGS
Merge Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/MergeGamesLtd
Merge Games Discord: https://discord.gg/mergegames
Merge Games Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MergeGamesLtd

Follow developer Half Past Yellow!
Twitter - https://twitter.com/halfpastyellow
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/HalfPastYellow
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/halfpastyellow_/
Website - https://halfpastyellow.com/
